        Creates a Branch between the given rootitem and the given SAObject and links them together in the Two-Way-Hash-Map.

      • open

        private void open(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage,
                  javafx.scene.control.TextArea text,
                  boolean keep)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the contents of a selected XML file, converts them into java objects and creates the corresponding TreeItems in the treeview.
        Parameters:
        primaryStage - The main stage.
        text - The TextArea.
        keep - True, if you want to keep your progress, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Will be thrown, if there is no selected file.
